name: Blue_Mint3
description: Loose sketches of girl figures caught in a flow of emotions. A bit of hope on top of resignation, hesitation and melancholy. Exploration of flow, hand drawing, fast sketches and visible paint strokes. Created fully digitally in Photoshop. Mint 3 (out of 6) Edition of 5  Mint 3 is the most expresive one - Girl sketches are dimmed by fast yellow paint strokes, this is more experimental mint with an performative attitude.  Warsaw, FuzOne 30 04 2021
